movie.title: Destruction Los Angeles
movie.description_intro: A volcanic eruption and sudden earthquake devastate Los Angeles, and reporter John Benson seizes him once in a lifetime chance to cover the breaking news from the epicenter OR he can choose to gather his family in the middle of pandemonium and lead them to safety.
movie.description_full: A volcanic eruption and sudden earthquake devastate Los Angeles, and reporter John Benson seizes him once in a lifetime chance to cover the breaking news from the epicenter OR he can choose to gather his family in the middle of pandemonium and lead them to safety.

movies.title: Project Marathwada
movies.summary: Project Marathwada is the story of a Marathwada-based indebted farmer, who comes to Mumbai in hope of being helped by the Government after the suicide of his son. The story takes a turn when he comes across four college students who are making a documentary on the same subject.
movies.description_full: Project Marathwada is the story of a Marathwada-based indebted farmer, who comes to Mumbai in hope of being helped by the Government after the suicide of his son. The story takes a turn when he comes across four college students who are making a documentary on the same subject.

movies.title: And Now for Something Completely Different
movies.title_english: And Now for Something Completely Different
movies.title_long: And Now for Something Completely Different (1971)
movies.summary: A collection of re-filmed sketches from the first and second seasons of the cult television comedy show Monty Python's Flying Circus (1969). Includes such classics as "Nudge, Nudge", "Hell's Grannies", "Killer Cars", "Dead Parrot", "Lumberjack Song", "Blackmail", and "Upper Class Twit of the Year".
movies.description_full: A collection of re-filmed sketches from the first and second seasons of the cult television comedy show Monty Python's Flying Circus (1969). Includes such classics as "Nudge, Nudge", "Hell's Grannies", "Killer Cars", "Dead Parrot", "Lumberjack Song", "Blackmail", and "Upper Class Twit of the Year".

movies.title: Cai li fa xiao zi
movies.summary: International favorite Alexander Fu Sheng cemented his stardom in this, the fourth film in his esteemed director's "Shaolin" series. Fu gives both a great dramatic and kung-fu performance as an honorable carriage driver who finds love and death when he battles particularly homicidal street punks.

Fu gives both a great dramatic and kung-fu performance as an honorable carriage driver who finds love and death when he battles particularly homicidal street punks.

movies.title: Pimped
movies.summary: A modern transgressive thriller, Pimped follows Sarah Montrose, a woman who isn't well-equipped to live within society's accepted lines of behaviour, struggling with her own identity, desires, and loves. When all this is threatened by a monster, Sarah calls on all her strength and cunning to do battle with a psychopath, and her own inner demon.
